John Lin.description: winding down for the night by meditating for 15 minutes, followed by a final review of his journal entries from the day to consolidate his thoughts and ideas before heading to bed (setting up a calming environment by dimming the lights and lighting a candle) @ the Ville:Lin family's house:common room:shelf
